|Title=Knowing the main long-term consequences of HGI in women

Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy

question.question: What are the main long-term consequences of pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) in women?
question.option_a: Chronic fatigue syndrome and recurring headaches
question.option_d: Recurrent urinary tract infections and kidney stones
